tests

Class HtmlBillGeneratorTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.HtmlBillGeneratorTests

  • public class HtmlBillGeneratorTests
extends java.lang.Object
    Tests behaviour of HtmlBillGenerator in an isolated context.
